talk_text: #NAME#, you'll have to endure some rigorous trials to train someone to become the ultimate Overlord.

You shouldn't take these trials lightly. 
They're crucial to your goal.

Well!? Miss Etna.... 
Did you just come up with some ghastly idea?

Ding dongâ™ª! You guessed it, Flonne!
The final BOSS fight is about to begin!

Miss Etna.Is this really the final BOSS fight?
To be honest, I expected something more...

Keep watching! The show is about to begin.
Look over there.
We have finally found you, loathsome Overlord!!
When evil casts its sinister shadow,
We appear out of nowhere!
Our seven lights spring to the task,
To save the world with courage and hope!!

Together....!!
We are...!!
The Prism...!!
Rangers!!!!

Oh, oh, oh!! They're so cool!!
The Prism Rangers!!

....What? Are you telling me, 
#NAME#, that they 
are the final Bosses...???

Yes!
They are the reason that we want to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord!

Exactly!
Let's go, Prism Rangers!

Wait a second, Flonne.
Why are you rooting for them?

*Sniffles*
The Prism Rangers have lost.

Hmph...
It doesn't matter what world it is! 
Justice is never inevitable!

The more despicable you are, the better!
Betray, cheat! Do whatever you want!

Whenever someone doesn't obey you, 
just bribe them or use violence to make them listen!
This is what a real Demon would do!

Don't forget that #NAME#?s actually 
a human....

Hehehe......
You think that defeating a few stupid heroes 
makes someone the Final Boss? What a joke!!!
Y, You are....!?

Hehehe......
You think that defeating a few weak heroes 
makes someone the Final Boss? What a joke!!!
Y, You are....!?

Ah, Prince.
How did you get here?

I heard that some intelligent Human was trying 
to train someone to become the ultimate Overlord.

...Hmm, 
and you are #NAME#?
You're quite bold for a Human...

Forget it.
I, the great Overlord Laharl, can tell whether you're right for the job. 
Are you qualified to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord?

You speak with such dignity, 
but have been defeated so easily.
Prince Laharl is so weak.

Y,You idiots.
I was just testing this guy.

In the next battle, the opponents will be my very own 
elite troops!
Prepare yourself.

Oops.
How did they lose?

T,This is impossible....!!
Why are my elite troops 
so weak...!!!??

Is there anyone who doesn't know 
that the Prince is an arrogant, selfish jerk?
You are not good enough to train Demons.

Prince, by the way...
How did you train those soldiers?

I have my own grueling training program....
They need to play 1000 hours of video games without eating or drinking, 
and are prohibited from washing their hands or rinsing their mouth out...

After they've blown their nose, they'll need to show it to someone else. 
They can't do any homework during summer break, 
and they'll have to take part in loads of other bad behavior.

....But how will this help someone 
become stronger?

Quiet!
Only I am able to tell whether 
you are qualified...no one else! Let's go!

Humph, #NAME#.
It seems... 
that I underestimated you.

Let me show you how powerful I am 
when I'm at Lv. 9999!

The effect will become immediately noticeable once I eat this!
I'll be able to transform into a Lv. 9999 Demon God 
in the blink of an eye!!

....What do you think about the slogan? 
It really helps sell this powerful drug, 
right?
Trans........form!
....What?

W,W,What 
is this....
...!!??
Ahhhhhh...!!!!!

Why has the great Laharl 
been changed into a 
woman!?

Is this some kind of joke!?
How can I show off my powe r
when I look like this!?

Well...
There are certainly many men 
who would be interested in your new appearance.

You should be happy 
to be given such a 
perfect feminine body.

Prince, 
are you trying to challenge us?

What? Is this your special way 
of telling us something?
I will not show you any mercy!!

You idiots!!
Stop fooling around! 
Find a way to get me back to normal!!

Ok, ok, ok...Betty Boop.
Let's get outta here, #NAME#.

Miss Etna.
Do you know how we can 
get Laharl back to normal (?) ???
I have no idea.
...Well, that isn't very helpful.

Hey, it's time for sweets!!
Sometimes, a little sugar in the brain 
is all one needs to think of something!

I think it's just you who 
wants to eat sweets right now, Etna..

What is with this pudding!? It doesn't have 
that elastic quality that pudding usually has! WHAT!
I want to speak with the boss of this restaurant!

It's you! 
The legendary Mr. Champloo...!!

That's my name!
I am also a Kitchen Fist Master, trained in the Fire Chaos Style!
Champloo!

Hey, Miss Etna...
Do you know this guy?

He's a legendary Netherworld chef.
He's so good at cooking 
that he can turn any ingredients into a wonderful meal.
...I don't understand a word.

My name is Etna!
I wish to challenge you 
to a cooking battle! In this battle, we'll both need to make sweets!!

A challenge, you say!? Boom! 
... What ingredients will be used?

Oh.
There are some Prinnies there.

Hmm? How strange.
Yes, I used a ton of Prinnies for that one. I'm still waiting on it to be done.
No, that's impossible.

Blasphemy! Anything can be cooked if you set your mind to it! WHAT!
Cooking comes from the heart!
Cooking means always risking your life! Don't underestimate cooking, kid!

Look! Look at what I've just cooked!
It's called....
"Prinny P-P-P-Pudding"!

Wow!
I'm going to get started!!
.... Let's eat!

Ahh........Its scent is so tempting. 
It tastes as smooth as silk. 
It's sweetness is unparalleled.....

This...This is amazing!
It's an unprecedented creation! It's spectacular! 
It's the greatest sweet ever!

...I guess she has completely forgotten 
about Laharl.
To be continued...

Ooooh...So full...
I can't even move.

Me too...
When I'm full, I usually fall asleep and start snoring...

Oh, #NAME#.
These two are hopeless.
I guess I just have you for now.

There is only one way that this cursed body 
will be restored to normal!
...A Dark Assembly!!

Let me explain. The so-called Dark Assembly 
is a convenient feature in the Netherworld 
where wishes can be granted.

But, be careful, when you try to hold a Dark Assembly, 
there will also be other powerful Demons.

So, it isn't as simple as 
a genie in a lamp granting you 3 wishes.

Alright, #NAME#.
When we go to a Dark Assembly, we can bribe the Senators there.
It's best to bribe the highest level Senator possible.

Laharl-chan 
has temporarily become your partner!

Laharl-chan 
will now fight alongside you 
as a companion.

Listen up, #NAME#!
As their name suggests, 
Demons are the embodiment and source of all evil.

A good Demon should never wash their hands after the toilet. 
They should put their mouth on the clarinet of the girl they like 
and draw pictures of their teachers in their textbook...

They play video games 100 hours a day and 
never share their snacks.... 
So, does that make you scared?

So, you ask, what bribe could possibly 
persuade a Demon....?
It needs to be done covertly.

...I hope no one sees me.
If I am discovered, 
it would be a huge scandal.

I, Lord Axel, aka the most popular dark hero, need to be respected by the Netherworld. 
If I get caught, my little hobby may get found out, 
but it will create a terrible stir.

....Hmm, 
I've got it!

I've finally obtained a fantastic machine that can 
help me destroy that stupid mosaic 
so that I can sing in praise of spring in peace!

Yeah, that one! Men all over the world 
dream about being able to remove that pesky mosaic! 
The Senators are no different.

Hmm.....
You've prevented me from achieving my dream 
for too many years...

Such deep hatred! 
I will take revenge! 
Ugh...

At this point, 
Axel begins crying with tears of blood....

Axel then makes a vow 
that he will get revenge 
on #NAME#.

Hmph. In the Netherworld, the strong eat the weak.
If you need to hate someone, you should hate yourself for being so weak.

(â€»Note:
This is a crime in the human world!)

Alright, #NAME#.
Haha! Now, we're ready to bribe some Senators!
To the Dark Assembly!

I am Laharl, the Overlord!
Now, listen to me. I've got to 
talk to you about something. Listen closely...
"Give me back my real body"!!
NAY! NAY! NAY! NAY!

Unbelievable!!
Well...I guess there is always an alternative way to get people's approval.

#NAME#, 
come help me out!!
NAY! NAY! NAY! NAY!

Why!?
Why do you object!?

Overlord Laharl.
As the speaker of the house, let me answer your question.
All of us here are in agreeance...

We all quite like 
your new appearance 
and want you to keep it.

Well, 
it's just that, 
we really like your new look.
S,Shut up! This is ridiculous!

Hahahahaha, do you think you can escape!?
Your heart 
belongs to me!

Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
ahhhhhh!!!!!!!!!

What!
This body is preventing me from using my full power....!!

Muahahahahaha!
Stop trying!
You have no way of escape!!
Sexy.......Beam!!
Sexy Beam's special effect..
Gwaaaaaaa!!?
The beautiful Demon Etna has arrived!!

Get ready!
Love Punch!!

Love Punch's effect 
(Flonne's voice can also be heard shouting "Crab miso!")
Ahhhhhhhhhhh!!

The Angel of Love, Flonne, 
descends from the sky! Ding, ding, ding, dong!!
Y,You came...!

....Hmph.
You're too late.

Still as stubborn as ever. Obviously, you are happy to see us.
You never show a hint of honesty.

Ok, ok. This is the Prince 
we know and love.

Well, then. 
Let's deal with these losers!
Prince Laharl and #NAME#?nwill deal with the speaker!

.......Ok. 
#NAME#! Let's go!!
YEA! YEA! YEA! YEA!

A,Awesome!
We did it, #NAME#!!
The vote got passed!
But it took a battle for that to happen.

Well... This is the Netherworld, after all.
So, who cares!

Oh? Oh?
My body....!!

Yes!!! I'm back!
No more melons!

Yes! This is the body 
of a real Overlord!!
Hahahahahaha!

......#NAME#.
I know an Overlord shouldn't say thanks, but..

To show my gratitude, 
I would like to say I believe you have what it takes.

From this day forward, 
you will be my vassal.

#NAME#
was made Laharl's vassal without permission!
... And has no right to refuse.

In the future, we will fight side-by-side against even stronger enemies.
So, we've gotta start preparing.

Whoops.
Remember, the Prince doesn't hand out compliments 
very often, #NAME#.

So yeah, you should be proud of yourself 
for getting the Prince's approval so quickly.

#NAME#?s really 
a preacher of love.

....An admissions application?
A Human. How interesting.

Perhaps I can turn this Human 
into a Delinquent (VILLAIN).
To be continued...

Congrats, 
#NAME#!
Welcome to the Evil Academy!
Flonne, how unexpected.

Well, it isn't too late yet, and time is money.
If we're going to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord, we're 
going to have to help #NAME#?peed things up a bit.

Ah...
So you're the transfer student I've been hearing about.

I am Raspberyl.
I am a Delinquent Teacher at this academy.

I've been hearing about you, #NAME#.
I heard that you are a Delinquent (VILLAIN).

However, as a head teacher here, 
I won't allow you 
to be a common VILLAIN.

So, 
my goal is to make you the worst of the worst!!

Gwaaaa!
What shall we do now, Miss Etna!?

I don't want 
#NAME#?o become 
a delinquent!

You don't think it would be wonderful?
It would be fascinating.

I will be very strict with you.
I will try my best from the very beginning.
The first lesson will be about...
"Friendship"!!
Huh? Friendship?

Exactly! Learning about "friendship" 
is the first step towards becoming a truly Delinquent (VILLAIN)!

Hmm... Why do I have the feeling 
that something bad is going to happen...?

Speak with your fists! That's how a real friendship is made!
Then you'll be able to do a triathlon as you run off into the sunset!

Come on! Class is in session, 
#NAME#!!

Excuse me, Ms. Raspberyl.
The subject of this class is "friendship", right?

Correct. If you want to be a Delinquent (VILLAIN), 
you need to understand friendship.
...I have no idea what you're talking about.

Let me explain the values we 
believe in here at the Evil Academy!

What you call "good" in the Human World is VILLAIN here, 
and what you call "bad" is the Honor Student in Netherworld.

At the Evil Academy, 
the rules of morality have been flipped.

I see.
It's truly an Netherworld academy. The thought is so distorted.

Hmph.... So, is enrollment open?
I am confident that I will become an Honor Student.

You know a thing or two about being evil, 
#NAME#.

It seems that you will be able to 
create a solid friendship sooner or later.

Stop! 
Stop teaching this class this instant...!!!

I got word that some popsicle was teaching 
some airy-fairy things at MY academy... 
I should have guessed it was you. Raspberyl...

Hello, Mao.
Do you have something to add to my lesson?

Do I..?!!
What is the first rule at the Evil Academy...!?
"Demons must have no friends!"

Anyone who becomes a student here 
is forbidden from forming friendships!!

Oh, #NAME#.
If you break this rule, 
you are not worthy enough to be here!
I hereby expel you from the Evil Academy!!

You got guts. 
I accept the duel!
And #NAME#?ill fight for me!

If you get kicked out on the first day of school, 
everyone will see you as a #1 Honor Student. 
#NAME#, let's go!

If you lose, I will use you to conduct experiments!
Hahahaha!
Hahahahah....

Ok, prepare yourself!
Let's see how you handle my Doppelganger!

Nice work, #NAME#.
It may be just a clone, but 
it's not easy to beat Mao.

#NAME#.
Ok, class is over for today.
...Let's battle one more time!!

Ms. Raspberyl!
It may be too late to say this, 
but I would just like to say, violence is bad.
Yea... It's too late.

Hmmm. What is violent about what we're doing?
This course is all about what it means when hearts and fists 
come together!!
Okay, now I understand!!!!!
Flonne, you're so gullible.

Well done, #NAME#.
Your skills are quite impressive. 
They're getting me all fired up.

From now on, me and you 
will be like frenamies.

Yoroshiku, let's take care of each other. 
#NAME#.

A friendship that comes from the heart and 
from the collision of fists..... 
That's what it means to be young!!

Will Flonne also come to study at the Evil Academy?
I think you'll have no problem becoming a Delinquent (VILLAIN).

Hmm..... Raspberyl...
Don't you dare treat this Human as 
your arch-rival (friend)...

#NAME#.
I can't just let this go.

Just you wait, 
one day I will do experiments on you!!
To be continued...

Is everyone here?
No tardies and no absences. Good, good.
You have started walking down the long road to becoming a true Delinquent (VILLAIN).

All rise!
Prepare yourselves!
Salute! Sit down!

Hey, hey, hey.
I have always wanted to try. This procedure.

Flonne, it seems you are adapting well. 
.... So, what lesson are we learning about today?

Hmph...
Today's subject is "Volunteer Work"!

[Volunteer Work]
In ancient times, Demons often used the phrase "motherly love" as a code word for volunteer work. 
Many Demons feared doing it.

The etymology of this phrase 
can be traced back to the 13th Overlord of the Mourning Netherworld, 
Kuli.

Do deal with some financial difficulties 
that the Mourning Netherworld were dealing with, all of the citizens were forced to do unpaid labor. 
This was called the "Motherly Love Policy". The name comes from this..

The Overlord at that time 
wanted people to devote themselves to their country 
in the same way that mothers do for their children.

This policy was a complete failure. 
Eventually, it led to the Overlord being 
overthrown by his vassals.

This is an excerpt from 
How Volunteering Destroys Society

Volunteer for your neighbors like a mother works tirelessly for her children!
What an awesome story.
It really helps people understand the importance of maternal love.

Hey, Flonne.
Do you have a problem?

Even if you want us to do voluntary work, 
what work is there available for us to do?

We must protect the Evil Academy's morals! 
#NAME#!
The Makai Patrol has been dispatched!

The Makai Patrol....
What a splendid name!
We should ride in spaceships and drive in transforming robots...

Haha! Just imagining it 
makes my heart start beating fast 
and my nose bleed!
Aren't you excited, Flonne.

The Makai Patrol has a simple mission.
Once you find someone who is an Honor Student, 
show them some love. Finished.

.....Huh?
What about spaceships and transforming robots?

Ok! We're all set to go volunteer 
and sweat our youthful days away!!

I will not allow 
anyone to break the rules of this academy!!

What is the second rule at the Evil Academy...!?
"Never let anyone help 
you out with anything!"

But you want to do voluntary work!?
This is simply ridiculous!!
Prinnies, come out here!
Yes, master.
Oh, they are Prinnies.

#NAME#?nhas shattered our dream 
of improved working environment, dood....

But, there's more than one way to skin a Prinny!
His Majesty Mao 
promised that he would improve our working conditions!

Ah...
Tell me what issues you have, and I will think about it.

We work all year round with no rest! 22 hours a day!
A daily salary of.....2 Sardines!!
2 Sardines, dood!! That's a twofold increase, dood!?

Hmm, so be it.
Congrats. (This is recited without any emotion.)

We will improve the working conditions!
We will struggle until we are respected, dood!!

Amazing! You've defeated those Prinnies who were lured by 
a daily wage of 2 Sardines.
You are worthy to be my experiment subject.

However, the next challenge is not as simple as the other ones...
Come out! Pringer V3!!

What!? He's combined a bunch of Prinnies 
to create a supper alloy robot!?
This is not going to be easy...

You say that, 
but I can see that your eyes are sparkling.

Hmph...
The V in Pringer V3 stands for victory, dood!
Nothing can stand up against us and survive, dood!

We will not forget the 3 Prinnies 
who sacrificed themselves for this achievement, dood!!
Victory will be ours, dood!!

Wooooo!!!
Pringer V3 was defeated....

If we want to win #NAME#, perhaps we should 
use the legendary Prinny Bomb, dood....?

Ugghhh!!!!
Pringer V3 was created thanks to my amazing ingenuity, 
but even it was defeated....!!

Well, think about it, at the end of the day, 
it was still just 3 Prinnies put together.

*Sobbing*....
You should have given Prinny V3 to me 
instead of letting it get destroyed. Wah..

Now is not the time to be sad.
Look over there.

Pringer V3 
is getting up!

He also seems to have 
an amicable look in his eyes.

#NAME#!
It needs to join us!

Please, please ,
please, please, 
please, please (This continues for about a minute.)!

#NAME#
has extended a hand to Pringer V3.
Pringer V3 has joined your team!

Yesterday's enemy is today's rival (friend).
You cultivated a fiery friendship with an enemy...
Well done, #NAME#!

You're going to become an 
outstanding Delinquent (VILLAIN). That' amazing.

If Ms. Raspberyl approves, 
that means #NAME#?s an 
incredibly good person, right?

Basically. Whether or not that's a good thing, 
I can't really say.

Still as stubborn as ever. Miss Etna, you are expecting great things from 
#NAME#. 
Perhaps we'll really be able to train the ultimate Overlord after all.
I'm not...

AHHHH....!!
I won't forgive you, #NAME#!

Hmph.
Just be happy with this accomplishment for now.

When we meet next time, I'll deal with you.
I swear I'm going to make 
you my experiment subject.
To be continued...

Ms. Raspberyl-- !
What are you going to teach us today?

It seems you're actually excited for class. 
That's what it means to be a Delinquent (VILLAIN)!

Today, we will learn about....
"Cleaning"!!

[Cleaning Activities]
This includes various house chores like cleaning the floor, washing clothes, and cooking. 
All the Demons at the bottom of the social ladder used to do these things.

However, scientists in the Netherworld 
eventually realized that these activities 
were therapeutic.

These horrible chores made the Netherworld fall into a state of paralysis. 
Many of the lower class Demons launched a rebellion. 
The history books call this "a bitter squabble".

Few Demons today 
know that it is because of this rebellion 
that the Prinnies became servants.

This is an excerpt from 
A Secret History of Cleaning

So, these cleaning activities 
can help Demons purify their hearts.

So, students, do you think 
a delinquent would hold an umbrella over a dog on a rainy day?
Once you've done some cleaning, you'll understand why the answer is obviously "yes".

Ms. Raspberyl-- !
I don't think that's correct.

If we go through with this cleaning exercise, 
it'll eventually end in a fight......

Because this academy 
is just crawling with Honor Students.

For those criminals, it would be a better use of time 
to throw garbage on the street or illegally discard industrial waste.

Hmph....
It doesn't matter if it is garbage on the streets or defeating Honor Students in this academy, 
we'll just "clean" them up.

No.
We must use the whip of love 
to turn those hateful Honor Students towards the light of righteousness!

You idiot!
Students at this academy are supposed to be evil!
That is why it is called the EVIL Academy!

What is the third rule at the Evil Academy...!?
"A Demon should be curious and always 
look for new ways and new places to be evil!"

A Demon should live without a conscience! 
If a Demon wants to do something, nothing should stop them!

If you REALLY must do some cleaning, 
just go to the [Item World]
and get me an "Elixir"!!

Eh?
Why do you want an "Elixir"?
Because I need it for an experiment!!
It's always all about YOU, isn't it!?

C,Come on! Go get me an "Elixir"!
If you don't get the Elixir, don't even think about getting a good grade in this academy!

You triggered a special task:
[Goto the Item World to get an Elixir]
!

If you don't complete this task, you can't progress further in this game!
So you need to complete it.

You are quite capable of doing it, #NAME#. 
You successfully obtained the Elixir!

You need to give it to 
His Majesty Mao as soon as possible.

Did you forget it?
Here's the Elixir you asked for.

Ummm!
I didn't think you'd get it so quickly!
Damn #NAME#, maybe you really do have potential....

Do you have anything else to say?
Then I will continue with class.

Alright....
But don't think for a second we're done with this topic.
Stop right there, #NAME#!

Mao...
Why are you so stubborn?
Do you need to keep causing trouble?

Hehehehe.....
I would like to give you a little something 
as thanks for all the cleaning you've done.

Clang, clang, clang, clang!
The Dark Hero, Axel!
Like a phoenix, I have been reborn!!!!

I saw him fall into the garbage dump. 
So I took him home and transformed his body.
With the Elixir.

Ah...
Isn't this what recycling is all about?
I never thought you were such a VILLAIN.

Y,You idiot! This is just an experiment... An evil experiment!
This is just a stimulant!
Look at what it has done!

Power.....
The incredible power!!
I feel like something is exploding inside of me...!!
Uh...I think that may be myocardial infarction..

If you listen carefully, 
you can hear the crowd from my legendary performance 
shouting for an encore!!
Ha...I think you are imagining things.

[Warning] 
Doping...

...is the use of drugs 
to improve athletic ability. 
Many athletes often try to cover this up.

This behavior is forbidden in sporting events like the Olympics in the Human World 
because it does not conform to the spirit of athletic s
and the principles of fair competition.

Additionally, drugs can often lead 
to serious side effects for Humans. 
Good children must never do drugs.

I will get my revenge!
I don't want to be a Human, 
#NAME#!!

What...? 
You were never a Human in the first place.
Are you going crazy? It looks like the condition has already entered its final stages.

No, no, that is not what I mean. 
I am talking about risking it all 
to get revenge. Don't let me explain myself.

....One more time.
I don't want to be a Human, 
#NAME#!!

Oh.....! Today, 
I will spare your life...

However, #NAME#!
If you thought that you could surpass me in power, 
you were deluding yourself!

If you really want to be better than me, 
you'll have to learn how to rock out better than me....

Really. Although all of the obstacles were cleared away, 
our day of cleaning was rudely disrupted.

Sorry, everyone.
I guess my coaching abilities still need to be improved a little....
No, don't talk like this, Ms. Raspberyl!

At least we cleaned up that piece of garbage Axel! 
That's just like 
cleaning the slime off the dinner plates!

Flonne, even when you say something super mean, 
you still say it with a smiling face..

Yep! Mao himself said 
he found Axel in a dump. right?
So, we've successfully put the rubbish into the trash bin!

....Alright, let's continue!
Now, we need to conduct a melee battle before the sun goes down!!
Yes, Ms. Raspberyl!

....So, #NAME#.
Do you think it's right to say Axel is the combustible type of garbage?
Or maybe he's the incombustible type?

Huh!?
... W,What is this place?

You have more vitality than a cockroach.
Excellent.
You will become stronger.

I, it's natural!
Because I am 
the strongest Dark Hero in the Netherworld!

Let me ask you a question, Axel.
You just said you don't want to be a Human, right?

I appreciate your determination. Hmph...
Hahahahah....

Wait!
W,Why are you smiling like that!?

I will help you become stronger.
I'll attach a drill to your right hand and a rocket launcher to your left. 
On your right foot, I'll attach a Gatling gun and...

What!?
No! Don't come any closer!
N-N-Nooo!!!
To be continued...

It's been a long day, but this class is finally coming to end.
Are you ready, #NAME#?

Of course! Don't pull your punches!
Ok? #NAME#.

A good answer!
Today, we will learn about....
"Fundraising"!!

[Fundraising] 
There is a famous phrase in the Netherworld about this. 
We like to say "Sell your parents to honor them."

A long time ago, there was a Demon who did everything for his parents.
He wanted to build them a magnificent tomb, 
so he traveled everywhere to raise funds for it.

He tried all types of methods to get money.
He went to vending machines to pick up any loose change. 
He even became a scrap collector.

After doing this for 1000 years, 
this Demon finally became very rich.

His hard work really paid off.
He was able to build a magnificent tomb to honor his parents.

So, what about his parents...
Well...The Demon was so determined to raise funds 
that he even sold his parents..

This is an excerpt from 
Proverbs and Allegories of the Netherworld

Charities exist in the Netherworld. 
But don't forget we are talking about Demons here.
Do any Demons actually donate to charities?

Of course not.
So, we need to find a way to persuade them.
Sometimes, the whip of love will need to be used.

Is that so...
